entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Millertown 6:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: N 14 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over the Bay d'Espoir Highway area. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
